tweet: I was reading this #Forbes article & it was interesting to note that a major concern in #IoT is getting external data into a #blockchain through "trusted" oracles. @ForbesCrypto sounds like you guys should read up on trustless #oracles through @chainlink.  https://t.co/NfV4lGdCvY  https://t.co/fm8bP5r12S

A supplier calls a customer and says, ‘Hey, you didn’t pay me.’ The customer says, ‘I’ll pay you when you send me the bloody thing I ordered.’ The supplier says, ‘But I sent it.’ The shipping company says, ‘We delivered it. $Link is the answer #chainlink  https://t.co/W8DJsBa08u
@Just0Watching @davidgerard @chainlink You don't need a blockchain for that. You could do that with a simple replicated message log. Kafka would work just fine.
